lpuv.text: Use these buttons to see how the deck is sorted using the default keys

lpuv-copy001.text: Use these buttons to see how the deck is sorted using the default keys with 'reverse' set to true

jvmw.text:
rankedFixed and cardTypes always return the cards in the same order.

The other keys are more generic and the output will depend on the original order of the cards

pv58.text: When reverse is set to true, the sorting start as normal but in the end, all cards a reversed from top to bottom

info.name: Functions - SORT
info.attribution:
In this tutorial, you will learn:
- Which keys are included in the default deck
- How each key sorts the default deck
